Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Jaison, Corner, Waqar This calss contains the if statemests to identfy the 52 playing cards. Each of the cards is identfied by file name. first part of the file name is the numbers and the last part will identfy what shape does the card belongs to.
